name: MANvsVERIFIED
description:
A loose interpretation of MAN's journey to become verified on Twitter.

  • Punch, Fist, Forge, Catscratch, and Spill Coffee on a bunch of visual interpretations of Twitter puns and inside jokes
  • Broadcast to Twitch and have your viewers interact by flooding the game with hashtags of encouragement
  • Leveling system allows you to gain followers faster as you become more popular, just like real life.
  • Keyboard, Controller support for 360 and DS4
  • If you're wondering how he's doing, MAN eventually became verified. Watch MAN on Twitch.
